title: Fall Of Ramadi Highlights 'Fundamental Failure' Of U.S. Strategy In Iraq
teaser: NPR's Robert Siegel speaks with David Ignatius, columnist for the Washington Post, about how the U.S. miscalculated the vulnerability of Ramadi, Iraq, to takeover by the self-declared Islamic State.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
